mapper.sql: createTime, deleteStatus, name, phone, start, end, content, beginTime, price, endTime, receiveMoney, receiveText, emp_no, status, order_no, customer_no, bill_no
id, name, phone, start, end, content, beginTime, price, endTime, receiveMoney, receiveText, emp_no, status, order_no, customer_no, bill_no
mapper.update: update sys_sign_bill set deleteStatus = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select s.id, s.createTime, s.deleteStatus, s.`name`, s.phone, s.`start`, s.`end`, s.content, s.beginTime, s.price, s.endTime, s.receiveMoney, s.receiveText, s.emp_no, s.`status`, s.order_no, s.customer_no, s.bill_no, e.`name` emp_name from sys_sign_bill s left join sys_employee e on s.emp_no=e.emp_no where s.deleteStatus=0 and s.name like concat("%",#{name},"%") and s.status=#{status} and s.order_no=#{order_no} and s.endTime >= #{startTime} and s.endTime <= #{finishTime} order by s.createTime desc
